application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Submission of details of preliminary risk assessment report pursuant to condition 3; site investigation scheme pursuant to condition 4; quantitative risk assessment report pursuant to condition 5; remediation method statement pursuant to condition 6; verification report pursuant to condition 7; onward long-term monitoring methodology report pursuant to condition 8; enhanced sound insulation value DnT,w and L'nT,w of at least 5dB above the Building Regulations value, for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/ uses in adjoining dwellings pursuant to condition 9; sound insulation of the floor/ ceiling/ walls separating the commercial part(s) of the premises from dwellings pursuant to condition 10; Ventilation Strategy pursuant to condition 11 of planning permission ref: 2023/00333/FUL granted 27th March 2024.
